title: RD - Famous Neighbors, Freedom & Possible Defamation
itunes:title: RD - Famous Neighbors, Freedom & Possible Defamation
description:
Mark moves mountains to join Adam in studio only to be greeted by the news that they are both soon to have another famous neighbor nearby. They also discuss the TV ads that Gavin Newsom has been running in the state of Florida and touch on a little covered detail from the Amber Heard appeal. As the show wraps up Adam asks Mark about the potential for recent Adam Carolla Show guest Gina Carano to be able to sue a former Senator for defamation. 

Watch this episode & subscribe on YouTube at YouTube.com/AdamCarolla

Please Support Our Sponsors

MudWater.com/Doubt, Promo code: Doubt
